attributes.action: Abolish the Hostile Environment immigration policy.
attributes.additional_details: Because the way things are fills me and many others with shame and disgust.
attributes.background: Stop profiteering from extortionate visa charges. Reform the immigration department so that It treats people with respect, as human beings rather than animals. Stop destroying lives by depriving suspected illegals of work, homes and health care. Let us stop being ashamed to be British.

rejection.details:
We're not sure exactly what changes you'd like to see happen to the Home Office and immigration policy, but we think these petitions are simiar: 

Reduce extortionate and unnecessary UK Visa and Health Surcharge fees.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/321737

Allow asylum seekers to work if their applications remain undecided for 6 months
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/317772
